description: Support Node Exporter v0.16 and above, streamline and optimize the display of important indicators. Including: CPU memory disk IO network temperature and other monitoring indicators. https://github.com/starsliao/Prometheus

panels.description:
Read bytes The number of bits read per second per disk partition
Written bytes The number of bits written per second per disk partition
panels.title: Disk read and write speed per second

panels.description:
每一秒钟的自然时间内，花费在I/O上的耗时。（wall-clock time）

node_disk_io_time_seconds_total：
磁盘花费在输入/输出操作上的秒数。该值为累加值。（Milliseconds Spent Doing I/Os）

irate(node_disk_io_time_seconds_total[1m])：
计算每秒的速率：(last值-last前一个值)/时间戳差值，即：1秒钟内磁盘花费在I/O操作的时间占比。
panels.title: Time spent on I / O operations per 1 second

panels.description:
Read time seconds The number of seconds spent reading a disk partition

Write time seconds The number of seconds spent on each disk partition write operation

IO time seconds Number of seconds spent on input / output operations of each disk partition

IO time weighted seconds Weighted seconds spent on input / output operations of each disk partition
panels.title: Time consumption for each IO read and write (reference: less than 100ms) (beta)

panels.description:
Reads completed: the number of reads completed per second for each disk partition

Writes completed: Number of write completions per second per disk partition

IO now The number of input / output requests being processed per second per disk partition
panels.title: Disk read and write rate (IOPS)
Open file descriptor (left) / number of context switches per second (right)

panels.description:
Sockets_used-Total amount of all protocol sockets used 

CurrEstab-Number of TCP connections with current status of ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT

TCP_alloc-TCP sockets allocated (established, applied to sk_buff) Quantity

TCP_tw-Number of TCP connections waiting to close

UDP_inuse-Number of UDP sockets in use
panels.title: Network connection information

title: Docker Swarm Dashboard
